name: Attempting to log on with an incorrect password

testSteps.description: Given I am an authorized AIB staff member
When I attempt to log into the Application oneview using Device tablet in Region ROI using my Staff ID "00001" and Password "dublin1"

children.description: Login staff member: User [staffID=00001, staffFirstName=Philip, staffLastName=Sibley, region=ROI, application=oneview, platform=tablet, password=dublin1, branchName=DIT Aungier Street, nsc=931012]

testSteps.description: Then I should receive an Authorisation Error

userStory.storyName: In order to prevent unauthorized access to non-AIB-staff members, as a system admin, I want valid users to authenticate before they access customer information

title: Attempting to log on with an incorrect password

tags.name: In order to prevent unauthorized access to non-AIB-staff members, as a system admin, I want valid users to authenticate before they access customer information
